DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to identify the individual or organization that originated the transfer of a patient from one practitioner or organization to the University of Michigan Comprehensive Cancer Care Center.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individual or mechanism to begin the process of transferring a patient from the care of one health care provider or institution to another. [Manually-curated]
